February 7, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
...so, I've compared this guy to the other 60 point Captains in this set and I have no clue how he ended up at this cost or design. As a representation of the character he's garbage (his stats in close combat are worse than both Johnny and Sue), as a heroclix dial it's middling to poor, and compared to the other captains he has so little use or functionality. I'd be excited that he's finally get 8 click dials again, but this is the same set where Scott Lang ended up with a 9 click dial and both Johnny and Sue also got 8 click dials. When will we actually get someone at WK who reads spider-man comics again?
